regen.absent_element: criteria or process for entering Normal Startup Mode
regen.new_specification: If the TCS software was halted under normal circumstances, the TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode upon application of power.

regen.absent_element: situation or criteria to activate Normal Startup Mode
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode upon application of power if the prior software termination was planned and normal.

regen.absent_element: actions following mode determination, such as system initialization or checks
regen.new_specification: Upon determination of the mode, the TCS shall perform necessary system initializations and environment checks related to the selected mode.

label: When the TCS Software is terminated normally the TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode of operation upon application of power.
absence: situation of the TCS Software is terminated normally
